original_title: Half Man Half Biscuit: Back Again in the DHSS
overview: Back Again in the DHSS is the second vinyl album by UK rock band Half Man Half Biscuit, released in 1987. The album was released after the band had split up (citing musical similarities), and comprised Peel Sessions along with some new songs.  This video recording was released to accompany the album and features rare live footage and promo videos.  Tracklist 1		Dickie Davies Eyes (Single Promo Video) 2		Fuckin 'Ell It's Fred Titmus 3		Trevor 4		1966 And All That 5		Architecture Morality, Ted And Alice 6		Time Flies By When You're The Driver Of A Train 7		I Left My Heart In Papworth General 8		Seal Clubbing 9		The Continuing Saga Of The Cremation Of Hattie Jacques 10		Trumpton Riots 11		All I Want For Christmas Is A Dukla Prague Away Kit 12		I Hate Nerys Hughes 13		The Bastard Son Of Dean Friedman 14		Busy Little Market Town 15		Venus In Flares 16		God Gave Us Life
title: Half Man Half Biscuit: Back Again in the DHSS
